content:
RECEIVED YESTERDAY.
Battery- Very good at this range,6000mah is enough can last for at least days.
Performance- Performance is top notch. It beated my old device poco x3 in gaming and editing test.
Display- Display is good as it is 90hz panel.
Camera- There are 2 camera rear and 1 front all are too good using AI it improves the photo.
This phone is value for money.

Purchased GOAT Green on 1st day sale. Battery charging speed with Samsung 25w C to C Adopter is good and enough and lasts around 40 hrs of normal use.
I don't love hyper charging as it would damage the battery in future because my M30s lasts for 3 year 6 months without any problem until it was stolen by using the original 15 w charger only.
we can restrict signal distortions by using power saving mode as in most of areas there is conflict between 4g and 5g signals of network.
The microphone usage indicator is good. We can disable or enable it according to our usage and to protect our privacy.
Most of the bloatware is removable except pay mini and galaxy store.
Nice Display at this range and normal camera.
contains 2 dedicated SIM slots and dedicated memory Card slot is good and for me the 3.5 m.m jack is pretty good as i prefer to use Sony XB 55 wired ear phones since 3 years and mind blowing while you are listening Apple music.
No charger with box and no punch hole display because M11 and other models contain the punch display is somehow disappointing.
if you are a normal user and Chinese goods hater you can go for it.

It is okay to use as a secondary device and budget wise it justified for it's price. Those who wants samsung brand it will be good choice in budget and usable phone for 3 years atleast. Rest your choice.

This is giant.
Extremely superb.
A new experience.
After using this phone since 3 months now i can say this super giant is
Much much better than any version of i-phone.
Better than expected gets heads to turn and look at the phone every single time open in public

Good screen touch response
Processor
Battery Okey
Camera is better than expected
The experience is wonderfull
Excellent phone z fold 3. And also good seller.
Very nice

Screen: Best I can say... 144hz is something else it's the best n antiglare gives out Matt finish to the screen. Good for eyes health.

Performance: not even a single milliseconds lag..super smooth and best amazing.

Cooling system: it's removes heat quickly and efficiently and it has two fans. Always buy a laptop which includes two fan. No hearing is experienced...just a little while gaming may little warmer type on under side of the body while Playing games.

Keyboard- I like it and RGB is good.

Design- it's all black with a red line covering all the sides gives it a definitive look. Black is my kind of thing.

Booting: mine takes 9 to 11 sec always. It's really fast. And 512gb m.2 ssd is super cool..but I am planning to add 1tb hdd also.

Gaming: Far cry: 3, 4, primal =60 fps at high settings. Cod warzone= 50 fps at custom high plus medium settings. Assassin's creed odessey n origins =65 at low, 55 at medium and 47 to 50 at High. So it s a pretty good gaming laptop.

Easily runs- Cad, autocad, solidworks, blender, Adobe illustrator, InDesign, after effects, premiere Pro for good edition...( For higher editing go for RTX series), autodesk inventor, Maya Almost all.

Note: screen goes black for a second when connecting or disconnecting charger....no need to panic it's perfectly normal and healthy. It happens because the screen refresh rate changes from 60 to 144hz or 144hz to 60 hz at the time. So it's perfectly cool.

And yeah touch is really smooth like butter... everything is far better than my previous laptop.
And don't go for acer or lenovo. One has the screen facing vents and other I don't simply trust because of some experience with the products.
So Asus is good.
And If ur budget is real high then go for Dell gaming laptop over 1.2 lakh... Yeah dell is pretty high and great in quality.
Asus tuf is great in this price range.
Body: is pretty solid not flex at all....not even in screen and keyboard.
And use Screen protector "film" not guard only film. To protect it from dust and all.. u don't want ur first 144hz screen go bad.

Sound: Is far better then I expected and use Its DTS x app and select Voice and u will be amazed.

Battery life is better than Other laptops generally at official work it's can go around 5 to 6 hours and this is very impressive for a gaming laptop.

AND ALWAYS PLAY GAMES ON CHARGING....it's a high performance laptop it's can deal with charge effectively. Never play on battery....

So overall it is a very good machine almost best for me. 4.8 out of 5.

One of the best Laptop in this range. It is best in every types of uses.
Gaming performance is awesome 😎❤️❤️
Perfect product and is Valuable for money.

Laptop Performance is very good. The specifications are extraordinary. It's been 15 days since the purchase of laptop, the laptop for my research in Machine learning is so helpful.lastly, Delivery by flipkart was so prompt

Excellent laptop by dell, packing should be more strong and careful, faster delivery by flipkart in 2 days, laptop performance as expected, if they give Dell bag also we might feel happy for the price

Guys its a suggestion from my side.
DO NOT MAKE A MISTAKE OF ORDERING THIS USELESS LAPTOP.

IT GETS HEATED SO BADLY THAT YOU CAN'T EVEN USE IT.

WORST EXPERIENCE
